objection_handling.title: Handling Common Objections by DISC Type

D.response: I understand. That's exactly why we focus on high-ROI quick wins that take minimal time but deliver maximum results. Let's implement the top 2 priorities that will save you 10 hours per month.
Fair challenge. Let me show you the specific ROI data for businesses like yours. Here's what others achieved in 90 days.

I.objection: "I'm not sure my team will like this"
I.response: Great thinking! Let's involve your team in planning how to implement this. When everyone contributes ideas, adoption is much stronger.
I hear you! The exciting part is we'll work on this together. Imagine how great it'll feel when your team celebrates these wins with you.

S.objection: "This is a lot of change all at once"
S.response: You're absolutely right - and we won't do it all at once. Let's take this step by step at a comfortable pace. We'll start with just one small change and I'll support you throughout.
That's a thoughtful concern. We'll implement safeguards and I'll be available to help you every step of the way. You won't be doing this alone.

C.objection: "I need to see more data before deciding"
C.response: Absolutely - thorough analysis is important. I've prepared detailed appendices with methodology, benchmarks, and data sources. Let's review the specifics together.

C.objection: "How do you know this will work?"
C.response: Excellent question. Our methodology is based on [cite sources]. Here's the statistical evidence showing 87% success rate in similar situations.
